weight: Approx. 441 g (including battery and memory card)
brightness: Adjustable to one of five levels. Quick-bright LCD
batteries: Rechargeable Li-ion Battery NB-6LH (battery and charger supplied)
canonprinters: Canon SELPHY Compact Photo Printers and Canon Inkjet Printers supporting PictBridge
continuousshooting: Approx. 1.6 shots/sec (until memory card becomes full)
afmodes: Single, Continuous, Servo AF/AE¹, Tracking AF
flashexposurecompensation: +/- 2 EV in 1/3 stop increments. Face Detection FE. Safety FE, Smart Flash Exposure
closestfocusingdistance: 0 cm (W) from front of lens in Macro
imagestabilisation: Yes (lens shift-type), Approx. 2.5-stop ¹. Intelligent IS with 5-axis Enhanced Dynamic IS
construction: 13 elements in 10 groups (3 UD lenses and 1 double-sided aspherical lens)
modes: Auto, Manual Flash On / Off, Slow Synchro
settings: Auto (including Face Detection WB), Daylight, Cloudy, Tungsten, Fluorescent, Fluorescent H, Custom
meteringmodes: Evaluative (linked to Face Detection AF frame), Centre-weighted average, Spot (Centre)
powersupplybatterychargers: AC Adapter Kit ACK-DC40, Battery Charger CB-2LYE
movielength: (Full HD & HD) Up to 4 GB or 29 min. 59 sec.¹
lenses: Lens Hood LH-DC60, Filter Adapter FA-DC67A
